Mean Normalised Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) value for the revenue circle
Percentage area of the revenue circle detected as inundated

Intensity is calculated by dividing number of times a pixel got inundated with the maximum number of times any pixel got inundated in the Revenue Circle. For instance, if a pixel A in Revenue Circle got inundated 5 times in a month and the pixel with maximum inundation saw 10 days of inundation. Then inundation intensity of pixel A is 5/10 = 0.5. This variable then calculates mean of inundation intensities of all pixels.

indicatorTitle: Mean intensity of inundation (removing 0 intensity pixels)
indicatorDescription: Mean of inundation intensities of all pixels which were inundated atleast once in the month

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders
indicatorDescription: Total value of flood related tenders

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders granted under SOPD Scheme
indicatorDescription: SOPD Scheme is the State Owned Priority Development Scheme. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under SOPD Scheme

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders granted under SDRF Scheme
indicatorDescription: SDRF is the State Disaster Response Fund. It is used for meeting the expenditure for providing immediate relief to the victims of disaster. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under SDRF

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders granted under RIDF Scheme
indicatorDescription: RIDF is the Rural Infrastructure Development Fund maintained by NABARD. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under RIDF.

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders granted under CIDF Scheme
indicatorDescription: CIDF City Infra Development Fund is maintained by Assam Government for urban development. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under CIDF

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders related to Preparedness
indicatorDescription: Every flood related tender is flagged as either "Preparedness", "Immediate Measure" or "Other" based on key words. This column gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Preparedness Measures

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders related to Immediate Measures
indicatorDescription: Every flood related tender is flagged as either "Preparedness", "Immediate Measure" or "Other" based on key words. This column gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Immediate Measures

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood related tenders related to Others
indicatorDescription: Every flood related tender is flagged as either "Preparedness", "Immediate Measure" or "Other" based on key words. This column gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Other
